body.name: HP ENVY Inspire 7255e Wireless Color Inkjet Printer, Print, scan, copy, Easy setup, Mobile printing, Best for home, Instant Ink with HP+, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 12 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 41 mins
features: PERFECT FOR HOME - The HP ENVY Inspire 7255e is great for printing documents, high-quality borderless photos in multiple sizes, creative projects and more. Print speeds up to 10 pages per minute color, 15 pages per minute black. VIBRANT PHOTOS - Photos that look as vibrant as they do on your screen with true-to-phone quality prints, plus custom photo features in the HP Smart app. HP 5x5" square and 4x12" panoramic photo paper sizes are optimized for the HP ENVY Inspire series. This printer is...

3 MONTHS INK when you activate HP+ - Includes 3 months subscription for Instant Ink with HP+ activation. Ink comes automatically so you never run out. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled. HP SMART APP - Print, scan and copy from your phone--from anywhere. Get additional advanced features with HP+.

INCLUDES HP+ SMART FEATURES - Activate HP+ to get advanced features for mobile printing, security, automatic updates and more. HP+ only works with an HP account, internet connection and Original HP Ink for the life of the printer. EASY TO GET IT ALL DONE - Easy wireless setup, customizable touchscreen shortcuts, self-healing Wi-Fi.

KEY FEATURES - Print, copy, scan, automatic 2-sided printing, advanced photo features, separate photo tray, mobile and wireless printing. HP'S MOST SUSTAINABLE DESIGN - Made with over 45% recycled plastic content.
body.description: The HP ENVY Inspire 7255e is a premium multi-purpose home printer with everything families need to learn, work, and create. Loaded with features to print high-quality photos, homework, office docs and everything else. Includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time—at no additional cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this printer and the instant ink cartridges deal was a bonus! Super easy set up and easy to follow instructions! Enjoying this printer so much!! Excellent buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Follow directions for setting up.
reviews.reviewText: This is a replacement for an old HP that served its time. I Googled a couple of set-up videos prior to the actual setting up. It took me 45 minutes to unpack and watch the videos, and 1/2 hour for the actual set up. User friendly and excellent print quality. And, I’m 81 years old!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: This printer has difficulty staying connected to Wi-Fi and the print quality is not good even after cleaning and aligning cartridges. HP support is also not very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst printer experience ever. Stay away from this one.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using, building, testing computers and peripherals for four decades. I've seen brands and quality rise and fall.Never before have I encountered such a magnificently disappointing printer. So bad!Setup is not as simple as they wish you to believe. Plus, you can only use the printer through their proprietary app.The feature that let's you switch to less costly generic ink cartridges is no longer available. They tell you it is, but when you do it... nothing changes.So, you are trapped using the extremely expensive HP ink. Of course, it runs out so fast it's not worth buying.Our install ran about ten printed pages. All told, we didn't even print thirty pages before the ink was low and streaking / fading.If I could, I would return this disappointing flop. Unfortunately, we waited until after Christmas to install it, so we are recycling it.Rather than buy the overpriced ink cartridges, instead we just added another fifty bucks and purchased a new Lexar Color Laser Printer All in One.Don't buy this HP... it's a total headache!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far, so good 👍🏻. We replaced an HPENVY printer that we’d had for about 10 years. We never had any issues with the old one (till it eventually died) using it on a daily basis. This one was super easy to set up and get going. NOTE: After reading other reviews, I inserted the ink cartridges and DID NOT scan the QR code…I don’t want auto shipping of replacement ink, because I found with our last HPE printer that the less expensive ones work just fine. Wi-Fi set up took literally seconds. The paper tray holds a good size stack of paper, and the ink section is easy to access. The little info window tilts upwards or lays flat..tilted makes it much easier to see and use. It has a QUIET print mode, and while it’s definitely quieter than regular mode it significantly slows the print process. Nice looking, clean lines, simple features. 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good - Solid Printer
reviews.reviewText: Don't know about Tech support. Haven't needed anything as yet. Works great and so far no paper jams whatsoever. Excellent product for the price. Thank you, to the creators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Replacement for HP printer scanner that died. It works as expected however I did have issues in setting it up. Problem was in Windows 11 settings that needed to be changed manually. It wasn't a flawless upgrade.

I bought this printer because other reviews mentioned the easy set up, and there's nothing I hate more than fiddling with technology and spending hours struggling with tech that isn't intuitive. This printer was so easy and quick to set up. I originally set it up on my phone, then added it to my laptop, then sent a link right from the app (also easy to navigate) to a family member so they can send documents to print right from their home which is in a different city! The 6 months of free ink was an easy addition right through the app (you do have to enter credit card info), and there's an option for them to notify you that the subscription will run out two weeks before you start to get charged-- I set up the printer yesterday and I already have a confirmation that ink is on the way. The only draw back is that new printers always come up with "set up" cartridges that don't have much ink and don't last long at all. Overall, very happy so far even though I've only started using it. I had an HP years ago and I don't remember it being this easy or intuitive, and it looks great too!

Printer has blown past my expectations. My objective was for a basic printer to get hard copies of documents in monochrome color because haven't purchased a new printer for over 15 years. So far there are no complaints and the printer has gone past my needs. The product quality and capability has improved my opinion of Hewlett-Packard. The printer is affordable, scans film photographs for color printing and doesn't take up much space. It is easy to use, low hassle set-up with much support online. Enjoy using it to see what other functions it has.
So easy to set up. Was printing very quickly. Great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: The ink does not come with. You need to fight to get it.
I would not recommend this product
reviews.reviewText: I cannot recommend this product because it does not print colour well whatsoever. In fact, it has several lines in it, and colour tones are totally off, despite buying the cartridges, realigning everything and doing all the tests that the manual recommends. Unfortunately, this is the last time I’ll ever buy another HP product.
